stobs bcu ni mgon no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni ma'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni pha'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni lam mo/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni snang ba'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o/ /shes pa'o/ /shes rab bo/ /
mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni skyabs so/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni mgon no/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni ma'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni pha'o/ /so so yang
dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni lam mo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni
snang ba'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o/ /shes pa'o/ /shes rab bo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni skyabs
so| |so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni mgon no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni ma'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni pha'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni lam mo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni snang
ba'o| |sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o/ /shes pa'o/ /shes rab bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dpung gnyen no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa bco brgyad ni skyabs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mgon no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ma'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
brgyad ni pha'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam mo/ /lam gyi rnam pa
shes pa nyid ni snang ba'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o/ /shes pa'o/ /shes rab bo/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dpung gnyen no/ /
lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni skyabs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mgon no/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni ma'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni pha'o/ /rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar byed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
po 'di dag ni/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
gi'ang yab dang yum du gyur to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi'ang yab dang yum du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
po 'di dag ni/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
gi'ang yab dang yum du gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar 'di las byung ba ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/
rab 'byor/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar 'dod pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams bsdu bar bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang /

tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa ste/ rab 'byor/ ngas don gyi dbang de mthong bas 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston pa dang / ma dang / pha dang / dpung gnyen dang / skyabs dang / mgon yin no zhes brjod do/ /rab 'byor/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya bar 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tshom bcad par 'dod pa dang / sangs
rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang la bslab par bya ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las rgya cher bstan to/ /rab 'byor gyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i
mtshan nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan nyid gang yang med do/ /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchis pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis
sam| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis chos
thams cad yod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/ chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis dben pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni chos thams
cad kyis stong pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan
nyid des chos thams cad yod do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis dben la/ chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis
stong na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang ji ltar mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ dben pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par
byang bar mi 'gyur/ stong pa nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur/ dben pa dang stong pa nyid ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/ dben pas ni stong pa nyid la chos gang yang mi dmigs/ dben pas ni stong pa nyid las sems can gang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu mi
dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bstan pa de'i don bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sems can rnams yun
ring po nas bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba la spyod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de de ltar lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de de ltar lags te/ sems can rnams yun ring po
nas bdag dang bdag gir bgyi ba la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'on kyang bdag dang bdag gir bya ba dben zhing stong ngam/ gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ dben no/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ stong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'on kyang bdag dang
bdag gir bya bas sems can rnams kun tu rgyug cing / kun tu 'khor bar gyur tam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de de lta lags so/ /bde par gshegs pa/ de de lta lags
te| bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi bas sems can rnams kun du rgyug cing / kun du 'khor bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na sems can
rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa yod pa yin te/ gang la bdag tu bya ba med pa dang / bdag gir bya ba med pa de la 'dzin pa med/ gang la 'dzin pa med pa de la sems can kun tu rgyug cing /
kun tu 'khor ba med de/ de la kun nas nyon mongs pa gang yang med pas/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na sems can rnams kyi rnam par byang ba yod pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ gzugs la mi spyod/ tshor ba la mi spyod/ 'du shes la mi spyod/ 'du byed la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa la mi spyod do/ /mig la
mi spyod/ rna ba la mi spyod/ sna la mi spyod/ lce la mi spyod/ lus la mi spyod/ yid la mi spyod do/ /gzugs la mi spyod/ sgra la mi spyod/ dri la mi spyod/ ro la mi spyod/ reg la mi spyod/ chos
la mi spyod do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi
spyod| yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/
lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod/ sna'i
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba la mi spyod do/ /sa'i khams la mi spyod/ chu'i khams la mi spyod/ me'i khams la mi spyod/ rlung gi khams la mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi
spyod do/ /ma rig pa la mi spyod/ 'du byed la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ ming dang gzugs la mi spyod/ skye mched drug la mi spyod/ reg pa la mi spyod/ tshor ba la mi spyod/ sred pa la

mi spyod/ len pa la mi spyod/ srid pa la mi spyod/ skye ba la mi spyod/ rga shi la mi spyod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa la mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /nang

stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ 'dus
byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
la mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ dngos po med pa

stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la
mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi spyod/ dbang po rnams la mi spyod/ stobs rnams la mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa la mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams la mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams la mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi
spyod| rnam par thar pa brgyad la mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi spyod/
mngon par shes pa rnams la mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mi
spyod| so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mi spyod/ byams pa chen po la mi spyod/ snying rje chen po la mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu la mi spyod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi spyod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid la mi spyod/ rang byang chub la mi spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa
shes pa nyid la mi spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang spyod pa dang / gang gis spyod pa dang / gang la spyod par 'gyur ba'i chos
de dag thams cad mi dmigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi thub pa ste/
bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de
ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa'i gnas zil gyis mi non pa la gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bgyid pa dang ma bral ba ni zil gyis mi non pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal te dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams
cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa de la
rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gror byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde
bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa
dang | 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor/ gal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de
dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs
pa la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar
gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa
dang | rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i
yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor/ gal te stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag
thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs
pa la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /
bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston
pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsol bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor/ gal te stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji
snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du
bzhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang
ngo| |bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa

pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar tu bzhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud byas/ mchod
pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de
bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel
ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i
bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor/ gal te dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag
rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu
bkod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /
lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod
pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor/ de
ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / bcom

'byor/ gal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /

gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu

bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu
bkod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /
dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bas kyang rigs
kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam
par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par 'byed pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe
na| de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa
de lta bu ni sems can gang la'ang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po mngon par
bsgrub ste/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad gsad par 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar lta ste/ de dag snying rje chen po 'thob bo/ /de dag rnam par
spyod pa des/ rnam par spyod pas dga' bas rab tu dga' ba dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te/ de dag dga' ba chen po mngon par sgrub bo/ /de dag mtshan ma de dang lhan cig tu mi
gnas te/ de dag btang snyoms chen po 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shes rab kyi snang ba chen po ste/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang / sems can
thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go /de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
rnam par spyod pa'i phyir/ su'i gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad la yongs su spyod pa'i gtong ba dang / sbyin pa dag gi sbyin pa dag par 'gyur
te| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod par
khams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lam bstan par 'dod pa dang / snang ba chen po 'byung bar 'dod pa dang / khams gsum
gyi btson ra na gnas pa'i sems can rnams yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig bskyed par 'dod pas/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gnas par bya'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par mi spyod na'ang / des yid la bya ba gzhan gyi go skabs mi dbye ste/ des ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
nyid kyis nyin mtshan du mi gtong zhing brtson par gnas pa de ltar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sngon chad nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yod la
des dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rnyed par gyur te/ des nor bu rin po che de rnyed pas dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / yid bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa las/ des nor bu rin
po che de rnyed ma thag tu stor bar gyur na/ de'i rgyus sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par kyi hud bdag ni yid du 'ong
ba'i nor bu rin po che de dang bral bar gyur to zhes nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sha stag rgyun du 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos 'di ni rin po che'i snyam du bsams te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che de stor bar yang mi bya ste/ de ltar na rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bde ba mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ yid la bgyi
ba de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ yid la bgyi ba thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral ba lags/ bral ba la ni byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs/ yid la bgyi ba mi dmigs/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos
thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
kyang ma mdzad de/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas pa yin no zhes bya bar shes na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis dben/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de la
'phel ba med do/ /yongs su 'grib pa med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis dben zhing rang bzhin gyis stong
pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yang dag par byung zhing / bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yang dag par byung yang 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa med de/ de bzhin nyid la 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa med
do| |chos kyi dbyings la 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa med do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa ni gcig kyang ma yin/ gnyis kyang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te de skad du bshad pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum mi 'gong /
mi 'jigs mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis
brgya zhe bzhi pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid
dang / snying po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos gang yang dmigs su mchis sam/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/
bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ stong pa nyid las gud du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom
ldan 'das/ ci lags/ tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ 'du shes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ mig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rna ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ sna shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ ci lags/ lce shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ lus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/
ci lags/ yid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das/ ci lags/ gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ sgra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/
ci lags/ dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ ro shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ reg
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ chos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
'byor/ /de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa
la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ sna'i rnam par shes
pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/
ci lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ mig gi 'dus
te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
'das/ ci lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ mig gi
'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/
lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ sa'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
'das/ ci lags/ chu'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ me'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rlung gi khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ nam mkha'i khams shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ ma rig pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ 'du
byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/
ming dang gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ skye mched drug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/
ci lags/ reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/
sred pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ len pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ srid pa
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ skye ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rga shi shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci
lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/
nang stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ phyi stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
dam| bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ chen po stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ don dam pa stong pa nyid
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci
lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/
dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ dngos
po med pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/
ci lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor
gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ yang dag par spong ba
bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci
lags/ dbang po lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ stobs lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/
ci lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
'das/ ci lags/ bsam gtan bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ tshad med pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rnam par thar pa
brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
dam| bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
'das/ ci lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
bcu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ so so
yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ snying rje chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/
ci lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ phyir mi 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci
lags/ rang byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom
ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab

dang | gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid

pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos

phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus
pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos
