cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin
pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus
pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos
kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/
ci lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin
nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis
mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rang byang chub kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa
nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi
gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci
lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma
nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid
dang | yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
gal te chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de khyod kyis mthong ngam/
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod
pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam
du sems/ chos gang khyed kyis ma mthong ba'i chos de dmigs su yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang dmigs su med pa de skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ste/ rab 'byor/ bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes bya ste/ lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod/ de ltar
rtsol| de ltar 'bad pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mi
'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/ de'i chos
de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ chos thams cad kyi mi skye ba nyid gang lags pa de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ skye
ba'ang ma lags/ mi skye ba 'ang ma lags pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tam/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te skye ba'ang ma lags/ mi skye ba 'ang ma lags pa las kyang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/
chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/
chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos kyang
bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /'di ni mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa de thams cad med pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par mi rtog
pa'o| |shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu lnga pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i
slad du blta dka' ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag tu ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag pa'i spyod
yul ma lags pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zhi ba phra ba zhib pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du mkhas shing rig pas rtogs par bgyi ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /
'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/
de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin
nyid du nan tan byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go
mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las
kyi lam dang ldan par gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ mngon par shes
pa lnga dang ldan par gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par
byed par 'gyur te/ bzung zhing bcangs/ klags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/ kau shi ka/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des
brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char
yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /
grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de nas dge slong gcig gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka/ dzam bu'i gling gi
sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/
mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'dzin pa dang /
'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag gis zil gyis non to/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dge
slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong / dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pas kyang zil gyis non na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ klags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma
yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar
yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
rang sangs rgyas su'ang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs
mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par
yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa
dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad
de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang
ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang
zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag ni/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad du bstan pa dang mthun par spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du gnas pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams rgyang ring du mi byed pa'o/ /de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub las 'phang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sems can bying ba rnams 'don par 'dod pa'o/ /de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
bslab pa la slob pa ste/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no/ /de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'gro bar bya bar sems te/ nye bar 'dong zhing 'di skad ces smra'o/ /kye skyes bu chen po myur du slobs shig /skyes bu chen
po skyen par slobs shig /lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyis snying po byang chub tu 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas nas blang bar bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhes pa'o zhes zer zhing ston to/ /de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'dong bar sems
so| |de'i drung du bdag kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'am mtshe ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems
so| |lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ /lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' yang 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan
cig 'gro bar sems so/ /lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ /tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po 'ang tshangs ris
kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /
'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /shin
tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha
rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams kyis kyang rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de ltar spyod pa de'i lus la ni/ 'jig
rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa gang ji snyed cig lus la 'byung ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/ dge slong de ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/ 'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di lta
ste| mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad dam/ snying gi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/
'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod
dam| 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ tshe
dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa dga' bo/ bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs
pa brjod pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dga' bo/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin
te| lha'i dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan dang / legs pa brjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mthu'o/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs so/ /dga' bo/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa de'i tshe/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig to
can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin gyi/
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/ dogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro/ /
dga' bo/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa las sems gcig tsam 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang / zhum par 'gyur ba dang / spu g.yo bar 'gyur
bar skar mda' ltung bar gtong zhing 'jigs pa bskyed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du
mchi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sems
mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo / /dga' bo/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ 'on tam ma yin zhes the tshom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo / /dga' bo/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral na/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi thos so/ /ma thos
pas mi shes so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bsgom pa ma shes pas de bzhin nyid du nan tan mi byed do/ /dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis
glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral la/ dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs
su 'dzin pa byed na/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang

bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa brjod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag gi grogs yin te/ gang

dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas/ bdag gis grogs su rnyed pa ste/ de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa
dang | rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu gnas par 'gyur ba ni/ de bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' de
la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/ byang chub sems
dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab ste/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
'di thos pas ci zhig bya/ bsgoms pa dang bzung ba dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya/ ngas kyang de'i gting ma rnyed na/ khyod kyis lta rnyed re skan zhes zer na/ dga'
bo| byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang
chub sems dpa' brnyes par skyed cing / nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /nga ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /nga ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'o| |nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /nga ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ khyod ni sbyin
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no zhes rlom
sems su byed na/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag
nyid mchog tu rlom sems bskyed na/ dga' bo/ de'i tshe bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / nyams bde ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim zhing
yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems
dpa'i ming brjod pa'am/ rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyur na/ de ming brjod pa 'am rus brjod pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos
can dag khyad du gsod cing bdag bstod gzhan smod la/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mar bya ba'i yon
tan de dag kyang de la med par rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma de dag gis nyon mongs pa bskyed cing bdag bstod gzhan smod de/ 'di skad du ji ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg
pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par
mi snang ngo zhes de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la mi snyan par brjod cing smod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gnas ni stongs
par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dwags kyi yul yang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes ci nas kyang de'i
tshig gzung du rung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlob ste/ de'i tshig bzung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang / yid ches par
bya bar sems te/ de la de dag gis thos sam/ mthong na mthun par spyod par 'gyur te/ de dag gis thos sam mthong nas mthun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob ste/ de dag de bzhin nyid du
slob cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe/ nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci log du gyur pas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las gang dang
gang brtsams pa de thams cad mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/
byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dwags kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ dga' bo/ don
gyi dbang de mthong nas/ bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
pa pa gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsod cing / nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi/ khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du
sems te/ kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
'thab mo dang / 'khrug pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te/ de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo/ /de ni byol song
gi skye gnas kyi lam mo/ /de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo/ /de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang gang
zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la/ 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems
te| 'di gnyis ka'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o/ /'di gnyis ka'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi
rgya'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems
can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas dga' zhing spro ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/
gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing / 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/
gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi btang zhe na/ ci tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru bar gyur
ba de srid kyi bskal par go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam/ 'on te ma lags
kyi| bskal pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo 'chal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/ dga' bo/ de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/ byang chub
sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang 'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing mi snyan du brjod pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang / mi snyan par brjod pa byas nas/ phyir mi chags
par mdud par 'dzin cing khon du gzung ste gnas na/ dga' bo/ gang zag de ni 'byung bar nga mi smra ste/ gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid yongs su mi btang zhe na/ gdon mi za bar bskal ba de snyed du go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thab cing rtsod de
gshe ba dang mi snyan par brjod par gyur na'ang / mdud par mi 'dzin la phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin cing / bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste/ bdag gis sems
can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na/ de ltar bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na/ de ltar na
bdag gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing / phyir zlogs pa ni mi tshul gyis/ bdag gis de ltar mi bya'i/ bdag gis glen pa dang / lkug pa bzhin du bya'o/ /bdag gi bsam pa la
'khrug pa med par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla
bar bya dgos na/ de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyi/ bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o/ /bdag gis
de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de/ de la ni bdud sdig to can glags lta zhing glags
tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o/ /de dag dang
lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o/ /'dug par mi bya'o/ /gal te 'dug na'ang des su la'ang gnod sems su mi bya/ 'khrug par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang bdag gis 'di
dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang / 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la mi tshul lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
na| 'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o/ /'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o/ /'dis sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa
nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa
nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad
med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad
shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang la bslab par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /
des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston pa ste/ gal te de 'dres par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na de la bdag gis bslab par mi bya'i/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas na/ bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
bslab pa mnyam pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu zhe drug pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya zhe drug pa/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /
rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ chen po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/
'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ thog ma dang tha ma
med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam
pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /
rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni
gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba ni tshor bas stong / 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong / 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / mig ni mig
gis stong / rna ba ni rna bas stong / sna ni snas stong / lce ni lces stong / lus ni lus kyis stong / yid ni yid kyis stong / gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / sgra ni sgras stong / dri
ni dris stong / ro ni ros stong / reg ni reg gis stong / chos ni chos kyis stong / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna
ba'i rnam par shes pas stong / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong / lus kyi rnam par shes pa
ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong / mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong / rna ba'i 'dus
te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
bas stong / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor bas stong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong / chu'i khams ni chu'i
khams kyis stong / me'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong / rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong / nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong / rnam par shes pa'i
khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong / ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong / 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / ming dang gzugs
ni ming dang gzugs kyis stong / skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong / reg pa ni reg pas stong / tshor ba ni tshor bas stong / sred pa ni sred pas stong / len pa ni len pas stong /
srid pa ni srid pas stong / skye ba ni skye bas stong / rga shi ni rga shis stong / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong / tshul khrims kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
phyin par stong / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / nang stong pa nyid

ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /
chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong / 'dus
ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis
stong | chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi

dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang
dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong / dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong / stobs rnams ni stobs rnams
kyis stong / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong /
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong / bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong / tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong /
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong / rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong / mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong / mngon par shes pa rnams ni
mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong / ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong / mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang
dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong / byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong / snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bus stong / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong / rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis stong /
lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gag par bgyi bar slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob
na| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes 'dod chags dang bral
bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
pa lags sam/ 'du shes mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed
'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad
du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig bas bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
pa lags sam/ mig 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob
na| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba
'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
pa lags sam/ sna bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce
'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus 'gag par bgyi
ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
yid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang
